definition: the state of moisture in the soil (and whether it can support a crop)

sentences.english: IDW is suitable for drought distribution prediction in the field.
sentences.chinese: 反距离加权法适合田间墒情预测。

sentences.english: After cropping cotton crops before harvest, irrigation based on moisture content or not.
sentences.chinese: 两熟棉区在前茬作物收获后，根据墒情确定灌溉与否。

sentences.english: The reasonable scientific basis was provided for soil tilth optimization.
sentences.chinese: 为镇赉县土壤墒情合理优化提供科学依据。

sentences.english: Mulch plants to conserve soil moisture and suppress weeds.
sentences.chinese: 覆盖植物保护土壤墒情，抑制杂草。

definition: to sprout/to come out (of seedling)/to bud
to plant early/to sow seeds in early spring/early sowing
(of plants) to turn green again/to revegetate
sowing in autumn (for a crop in spring)
the embryonic development of grain while still on the stem
tiller (stem at the base of grass plants)
